about:
Hey there! I'am Mihir Pathak.

I code, read anythings I can get my hands on and on very rare occasions, write.
I am a CS undergrad with experience working in the web development industry. I currently work as a frontend developer at @pickyourtrail

projects.title: Audius

projects.title: AllQ
projects.content: AllQ is a freelance project that I did for a client that is basically an online E-commerce website that allows users to sell products.
